meanings.definition: More important than anything else; supreme.
meanings.sent1: It is paramount to wear a helmet while riding a bike.
meanings.sent2: Safety is paramount when handling hazardous materials.
meanings.sent3: The cat considered the cleanliness of its fur to be paramount.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, comfort is paramount above all else.
meanings.sent5: For a successful presentation, confidence is paramount.

meanings.sent1: The paramount of the kingdom was loved by all.
meanings.sent2: The paramount's decisions were final and unquestionable.
meanings.sent3: The paramount of the playground declared recess extended by ten minutes.
meanings.sent4: The CEO was seen as the paramount of the company, guiding it to success.
meanings.sent5: The paramount of the forest was the wise old owl, respected by all animals.
